entry.title: SNOWFALL WARNING , Claresholm
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 3:40 PM MST Thursday 09 March 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -16.4°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Claresholm 8:00 PM MST Thursday 09 March 2023
Temperature: -16.4°C
Pressure / Tendency: 102.4 kPa falling
Humidity: 83 %
Wind Chill: -21
Dewpoint: -18.7°C
Wind: N 7 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 16. POP 30%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Wind southeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light this evening. Low minus 16. Wind chill near minus 20. Forecast issued 6:43 PM MST Thursday 09 March 2023

entry.title: Friday: Snow at times heavy. High minus 10.
entry.summary: Cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries early in the morning. Snow at times heavy beginning in the morning. Amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind becoming north 20 km/h in the afternoon. High minus 10. Wind chill near minus 20. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 6:43 PM MST Thursday 09 March 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Periods of snow. Low minus 16.
entry.summary: Snow at times heavy changing to periods of light snow late in the evening. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind north 20 km/h becoming light in the evening. Low minus 16. Wind chill near minus 21. Forecast issued 6:43 PM MST Thursday 09 March 2023
